messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Leopold Way in Pittsburgh.
I'm sorry, I didn't get the whole address. Can you repeat it?
3309, Leopold Way.
Okay, are you calling from a cell phone?
Yes, a cell phone.
And your name?
Okay, can you tell me exactly what happened?
I'm watching TV, and I heard five shots, and there's someone laying in my front yard. A woman's in a sheet. There's a guy, it looks like he's dead.
I understand. Can you tell approximately how old he is?
I'm not going to open my window. I'm peeking through my curtains and the screen. It's dark, and it's hard to tell.
That's fine. Can you estimate his age?
There were like four or five shots. By the time I turned the light off and came to the window, I don't know who did the shooting or what happened.
Is there any serious bleeding?
I'm about 20 feet away and it's outside in the grass. I think the guy is dead.
Alright, I'm sending the ambulance now. Just stay on the line.
Help is on the way. An ambulance and the police are on the way.
Just stay on the line with me here.
There's a woman. I think maybe she's just naked in a white sheet.
Black lady. And there's another girl. I think she's got blonde hair.
911. What's the address?
Can you repeat the address for me?
What's the phone number you're calling from?
I don't know.
Come on. Where is he shot?
Come on. I need somebody right now.
I'll tell you exactly what to do, okay?
Come on. Is he still breathing?
Where is he shot?
Come on. Bring somebody.
How old is he?
Is he awake?
Yes, my brother. Is he awake?
Yes now. Come on, bring the ambulance.
Is the attacker still nearby?
No.
Is there any serious bleeding?
Okay, what part of the body is injured?
I don't know. Bring them right now.
Is there more than one wound? How many times has he been shot?
He's been shot, bring them, hurry now.
I'll tell you exactly what to do next.
Fuck.
Did you see who shot him?
Yeah, I know who he is.
Okay, what was the guy's name?
Come on. Bring the paramedics.
They're on the way.
Is there an apartment number?
Yeah, bring the paramedics right now.
What is the apartment number?
I'm standing outside.
Okay, just stay on the phone with me until they get there.
Come on, come on.
They're on the way.
Are you in the parking lot?
I don't know where you live, man. You gotta help him.
Okay, just stay calm. Help is on the way.
Something is wrong.
911. What's the address of the emergency?
Leopold Way, 3308. Someone came into my house and tried to attack me, and I had a pistol and I shot.
And you're at 3308, you said? That's not a valid address.
I mean, I can't. It's on Leopold's Way and Todd Drive.
What's the phone number you're calling from?
Can you please send someone?
Yeah, I'll get officers on the way. What's your name?
My name is Perry Lucas.
Stay on the line with me.
Okay. I'm just getting out of the way because these are thug-type people that came into my house, and when I took out a gun and...
What apartment are you in?
Apartment number three.
No, that's fine. I'll get you some help, okay? So you were attacked, and then you retaliated and shot them?
Yes.

Someone started acting crazy, and they attacked my girlfriend. I told them to leave. They didn't leave, and then they told me to leave. I told them I live here. Then the guy ran at me, and I shot him.
So you said the gun is unloaded and put away?
Yes, I separated the ammo from the gun.
Alright, where do you have the gun now?
It’s tucked away in the plant holder inside.
Alright Perry, I'm going to talk to the officers on the radio, okay?
How long is this going to take? Because I heard some sirens and I was hoping they were coming.
Perry, just stay with me. I'm talking directly to the cops.
Alright, can you hear me?
Yes.
Can you hear me?
Yes.
What’s going on?
I hear voices, I hope that's them.
Perry, I'm just talking with the officers, okay?
Okay.
